name: Supply Rush
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, your daily life requires you to run through danger in order to get enough resources to survive. How long can you survive?

Controls:

Click to move (The cursor will fill when you can jump)

E to grab

F to store

D to drop

I to sleep

Instructions:

Collect resources in order to get by

Keep away monsters by dropping your resources (Only recommended if you have sufficient resources to spare)

Keep away extra resources in your shelf to avoid extra trips

Download:

1. Download the file

2. Extract the zipped file

3. Double-click the application

4. Enjoy!
